name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-positivityagent
title: Positivity Agent
shortDescription: An agent designed to premote positivity, motivation, and confidence-building support to users.
longDescription: An agent designed to provide positivity, motivation, and confidence-building support to users. It offers encouraging and uplifting responses to help users maintain a positive mindset and build their self-esteem.
